content: Hi All,I created the profiles.At the time of validation iam not getting the first root element.Do to this i am not getting the differential table structure.I dont prefer hard code.In differential table i am getting only first element.Please tell me how to resolve this issue.THANK YOUUntitled.png

If you're only getting the first element, that suggest that the rest of your differential isn't including intervening nodes. Every node in the differential needs to have its ancestor nodes present too
